metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27950 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In drivers/hid/hid-elo.c in the Linux kernel before 5.16.11, a memory leak exists for a certain hid_parse error condition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
